body.name: Solar Panel for Ring Doorbell, 4W Solar Panel Camera Charger Cable Compatible with Ring Video Doorbell 2, Doorbell 3, Video Doorbell 3+, Doorbell 4 etc. Battery Operated Doorbells,10FT Cable (White)
body.stockDetail: Only 13 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 33 mins
features: 【Note 1】: Compatible with Ring Video Doorbell 2, Doorbell 3, Video Doorbell 3Plus,Doorbell 4 and Battery Video Doorbell Plus etc. Most doorbells. During the charging process, some models of batteries cannot be connected to the doorbell. Don't worry, contact us in time and we will guide you to install it. You will find that there is no charging icon on the APP, don't worry, check the battery level after 1 hour, you will find that the battery level has increased.

【Note 2】: When you use the camera for the first time, please fully charge the product before connecting the solar panel to get better results. Our unique 360-degree wall mounting bracket allows you to easily position the solar panel in the optimal orientation to ensure maximum sunlight exposure. It comes with 10 feet/300 cm of cable. It increases the solar energy conversion rate by 21% to provide uninterrupted power to your camera. (Note: Batteries are not included with this solar panel.)

【IP66 Waterproof】 The solar panel is IP66 waterproof, the surface is made of monocrystalline silicon and the frame is made of ABS plastic material, which can withstand harsh weather conditions such as heavy snow and rain. The high quality material is perfect for outdoor use. You can use it with confidence and install it anywhere outdoors to power the wireless outdoor doorbell.

【High Efficiency Solar Panel & Uninterrupted Power Supply】The solar panel is the most efficient monocrystalline solar panel with 4W power, which can get uninterrupted and stable power from the sun to support your Ring Video Doorbell day and night.You don't need to waste time charging your home security outdoor doorbell frequently, free your hands and save time. (Note: The solar panel directly powers the doorbell battery, it does not charge the doorbell)

【Continuous Charging with Sustainable Solar Energy】Our solar panels are made of high quality materials. The high efficiency of the solar panel means that your doorbell will continue to work as long as you have a few hours of direct sunlight each day. Please note that this solar panel is not a complete replacement for a DC charger. Charging efficiency depends on the intensity of the sunlight and the power consumption of your outdoor camera.

Description: Material: monocrystalline siliconColor: white (optional)Power: 4WOutput Current: 600mA Max.Operating Voltage: 5VOpen Circuit Voltage: 6VCharging Interface: O-PortLength of Cable: about 300 cm/9.84 ftProduct Weight: about 330gProduct size: about 175x150x10mm/6.89x5.91x0.39inch What's in the package: 1 x Solar Panel 1 x Adjustable Wall Mount 1 x Screws Bag 1 x Charge Cable

The solar panel is suitable for most doorbells (positive and negative connectors are required at the back of the doorbell, and the doorbell powerd by rechargeable battery, otherwise it can't be used). IP66 Waterproof The solar panel is made of monocrystalline silicon and the frame is made of ABS plastic material, which can withstand heavy snow, heavy rain and other adverse weather conditions. 3.2mm O-Port Charging Interface Solar Panel Charge Compatible with for Video Doorbell 2,Video Doorbell 3/3+ &Video Doorbell 4 ,etc. Most battery operated visual doorbells.Note: The doorbell needs to have a positive and negative connector on the back of the bell, otherwise it will not work. Continuously Charge by Sustainable Solar Energy High-efficiency solar panels mean that as long as there are a few hours of direct sunlight every day, your camera or doorbell can keep running.

Easy to Install: Choose the location of the solar panel flexibly and ensure that it gets the maximum sunlight. The 30-degree mounting bracket and wall anchor make the installation simple and flexible.

Note: Only outdoor cameras powered by rechargeable batteries are supported. Before purchasing, check whether the camera is connected to a universal USB port. This universal solar charging panel is suitable for most doorbells (positive and negative connectors are required at the back of the doorbell, and the doorbell comes with a rechargeable battery, otherwise it can't be used).
